column5: Air Tamarac friends- Booking a last minute trip to the Gouin. For those that have been there what bay is better for walleye fishing? Saraana East camps or Mattawa Bay? Going end of June first week of July. Please let me know.

Saraana West would be my choice. Saraana river dumps in there and larger water right out front of cabins. I fished there many times but boated in from Baie Possion, camping on near by islands to get away from bugs/bears. Mattawa is also good especially around spawning periods. Just my $.02 cents. FT
Freytown We would have to do Saraana East not West. Which is better Saraana East Or Mattawa?
EAST, your not far from West....go for it!! FT
I’m going to ESB in early June. I’ll post a report.
